heading: main man
subheading: william shakespeare, picked as britain's man of the millennium in a poll of bbc radio listeners, was hailed saturday as an international superstar. but scientists felt charles darwin or isaac newton should have taken the prize. as one said, shakespeare told us "what we already know but in a very beautiful way, whereas newton and darwin transformed the way we thought about humanity and the world."
author: wired staff
text: william shakespeare, picked as britain's man of the millennium in a poll of bbc radio listeners, was hailed saturday as an international superstar. but scientists felt charles darwin or isaac newton should have taken the prize. as one said, shakespeare told us "what we already know but in a very beautiful way, whereas newton and darwin transformed the way we thought about humanity and the world."
